duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of station store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, including executing the food program effectively.
Lead a team of employees and management, recruiting, interviewing, and hiring staff, and delegating and following up on tasks.
Resolving routine customer concerns, maintaining the overall store facility's condition, and ensuring product areas are stocked, rotated, and displayed effectively.
Ensuring all shift sales are completed in accordance with company policies and keeping accurate cash, sales, payroll, and inventory control records.
Assisting the Store Manager in maintaining a safe environment for employees and customers, and preparing or assisting in the preparation of periodic sales, product, and operating reports.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
Knowledge of basic business and customer service principles
